group_1.textCenter: I don't have anything special, not like Ria.

group_1.textLeft: Even if your idea doesn't seem special to you,
others may feel differently.

group_1.textRight: Precisely! Take a deep breath and say it@with pride!

group_1.textCenter: How about having Sayuki tour Mizuna in a special, one-time outfit?
That way, instead of introducing everyone to places around Mizuna like she normally does,
it'll feel more personal, like she and the viewer are visiting places together.

group_1.textLeft: So it'll be a special outing with just her and the@viewer… Kind of like a date.

group_1.textRight: A d-d-date?!
I, ah, I didn't think of it like that...

group_1.textLeft: We could have Sayu-Sayu taking her fans to@the best date spots in Mizuna...
...Yeah, I really like that idea.

group_1.textRight: And her wearing a unique outfit will give it a special feeling, even if it involves the same old sights.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think I've ever seen anything like it.
Do you have any ideas of how it would@play out, Mayu?

group_1.textRight: Vaguely. Something like...

group_1.narration: "Um...it's summer,@so instead of her usual outfit,@we can have her wearing her swimsuit..."

group_1.textCenter: Sayuki Fumino, your beloved blade-bearing@beauty...is honored to be here with you!
It'll be just you and me today. I'll slash my way@into your heart!

group_1.narration: "And Sayuki will need to talk directly@into the camera, so it'll feel like she's on a...@d-date, right…?"

group_1.textLeft: There's a big problem, though...
I simply can't figure out a way for Sayuki@to get the sword.

group_1.textRight: Well, since it was intended to be a prize...there@would need to be some kind of competition.
Whoever succeeds can win the sword.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
Whatever happens, I want it so she can spend@at least a little time holding that sword...
Oh...! Maybe she can carry it around with@her on the tour!

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: Just picture Sayuki in a swimsuit, holding@Kamigiri's sword,
traveling around Mizuna Ward, all put to video...
How does that sound?

group_1.textRight: How does it sound...?

group_1.textCenter: Sayuki Fumino, your beloved blade-bearing@beauty...is honored to be here with you!
It'll be just you and me today. I'll slash my way@into your heart!

group_1.textRight: If Sayuki says her catchphrase while toting@around an actual sword,
she wouldn't sound like a "blade-bearing beauty,"@but a blade-bearing psychopath!

group_1.textLeft: I'd say she'd sound more like a rogue samurai,@though.

group_1.textRight: Oh my gosh...y-you're right!
She'd be in deep trouble with the law...
Just forget I said anything, please!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… It's still a very good idea.
It would have been perfect if the project were@featuring yukatas instead of swimsuits,
and I think the idea of a dating video is excellent.

group_1.textRight: It's a brilliant way of getting the fans to become@even closer to Sayu-Sayu.
I'd like to incorporate it into a project at@some point.
We might even have the chance to use it@for this one if we play our cards right.
With that settled...we just need to hear@from our leading lady.

group_1.textCenter: I...I guess...there's only one way I can get it...but...ah...hmmm...

group_1.textLeft: She seems very troubled...

group_1.textRight: At this rate, I think she'll work herself into@a splitting headache...

group_1.textLeft: Sayuki! Do you have any ideas?

group_1.textRight: ...I do, but... *Sigh*

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about whether it sounds@ridiculous or not. Please tell us.

group_1.textRight: ...Okay.
